or updated model prior to each forecasts as a dynamic problem.
For example, it if the problem requires a forecast at the beginning of the week for the week
ahead, we may receive the true observation at the end of the week that we can use to update
the model prior to making next weeks forecast. This would be a dynamic model. If we do not
